<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Spirit Sense](/Spells.aspx?ID=718)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=43" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 225 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You open your mind to the metaphysical, enabling you to sense nearby spirits. Even if you aren't [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=519), you get a check to find [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) and [spirits](/Traits.aspx?ID=149) in the area. You gain a +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84), attempts to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, and skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws against haunts and spirits.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The spell's duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.
name: Spirit Sense
